channel.description: Recent content in stroke on Ray Pereda

item.title: 2018 Brain Stroke Day
item.description: Today is International Brain Stroke Day. If you are reading this, you are alive. Perhaps you survived a stroke and can still read. Yeah buddy!! Book Recommendation: The Left Brain Speaks, the Right Brain Laughs: A Look at the Neuroscience of Innovation & Creativity in Art, Science & Life When one side of brain is injured, you become more aware of the amazing differences between to the sides. You may love this book!
